ygData.subject: Dual Wield curiosity question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll start off with the coment that *should* my character do this .. it would be for RP reasons ;)  So skip any damage and delay analysis ... Has anyone tried
ygData.messageBody:
I'll start off with the coment that *should* my character do this .. it
would be for RP reasons ;) So skip any damage and delay analysis ...

Has anyone tried dual-wield with two 1-H Blunts? Does it work?

(i.e. Can it be done .. not is it the best set up).

Bombom
(who thinks she would be Swishswish if she dual wields slashing)
Ogre Warrioress
- current quest - find a spit, cut down on that kill to eat time ratio
thing, its really annoying her.
